settings.heading: The wizards
settings.description:
Trylledice was made back when corona started. We, Zac and Alex, were invited to a DnD game that Zac's old friend held. After falling in love with the game we felt down to a YouTube wormhole of How to create homemade dice set.
After two years with learning by doing we are now creating limited handmade dice set. We are doing what we love and what better way living life than doing your passion?
Alex create all the visual graphics for Trylledice. Beside making beautiful content for Trylledice he is always insane on a guitar solo.

settings.fact-list: My specialty is polishing dice. I play a cool guitar solo. I love making visual graphics
